summary: This mod adds a new spell: projectile that places a permanent magelight on impact.
descriptionHtml:
[i] [size=4] Ever wanted to decorate your enviroment with magelights? [/size] [/i]

[size=5] Permanent Magelight spell [/size]

Permanent Magelight adds a new spelltome to the game sold by Farengar in Whiterun.
This spell looks like a regular magelight, but upon impact the original magelight projectile disappears and is replaced by a permanent magelight \"object\" that does not disappear even after you leave the cell. [b] [size=3] You can place multiple of these, not just one. [/size] [/b]

[b] To remove the placed light, open your console, click the magelight (be careful not to click something else) and use command: \"markfordelete\"  [/b]

In rare cases the magelight doesnt spawn, just shoot the spell again in that case.

[color=red] v1.4  Added a new location for the spelltomes. [b]They are now placed infront of Farengar on his table [/b] [/color]

v1.3.2 Re-uploaded the file. It appears that I made a mistake with 1.3.1 which caused the mod not to work 

v1.3.1 adds third spell, [b] PM semi-intensive [/b] , which has double the radius as normal PM

v1.3 Brings another spell to Farengar\'s store. the [b] \"Permanent Magelight Intensive\" [/b], this is the same spell as original PM, but the light\'s radius is tripled

In v1.1 I have made a mistake while uploading the file, therefore neither the spell nor the item worked.

In v1.0 the spell was a usual magelight with 999 days duration, but this caused the magelight to disappear once you re-entered the house (since it was technically a projectile)


[size=5] Magelight Furniture item [/size]

Sold by Farengar. Once you drop this item it remains hovering in the air like lights in Archmage\'s quarters. (It still needs to be improved)



[i] This is my first mod, if you run into any issues or you have any ideas for improvement, leave a comment ;P [/i]
author: Theurg
